MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh affecting properties in Fettes Row and surrounding areas We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete the repair on our underground cable network , we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30PM. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:20 PM on Thursday, 17 December 2020
